Helix.text:
WHAT: Vision-Language-Action model for humanoid upper body control 
CATEGORY: Robotics 
FEATURES: Whole upper body control, multi-robot collaboration, pick up virtually any small household object 
CAPABILITIES: Dexterous manipulation, collaborative manipulation, object generalization 
STAGE: Commercial-ready 
LINKS: https://figure.ai/news/helix 
NOTE: First VLA to output high-rate continuous control of the entire humanoid upper body

company.text:
NAME: Figure 
POSITIONING: Embodied AI

NOTE: Developing robots that can assist in everyday home environments
